A '''potion of Water Breathing''' is a potion that provides [[Water Breathing]] when used.

== Obtaining ==
=== Brewing ===
{{Brewing
|head = 1
|Pufferfish
|base = Awkward Potion
|Potion of Water Breathing
|showvariants=1
}}
{{Brewing

|base = Potion of Water Breathing
|Potion of Water Breathing Extended
|name = Extended Potion of Water Breathing
|showvariants=1
}}
{{Brewing

|base2 = Potion of Water Breathing
|base3 = Potion of Water Breathing Extended
|
|Splash Potion of Water Breathing
|Splash Potion of Water Breathing Extended
|name = Splash Potion of Water Breathing
|ingredients = [[Gunpowder]] +<br> '''Potion of Water Breathing'''
}}
{{Brewing
|Dragon's Breath
|base2 = Splash Potion of Water Breathing
|base3 = Splash Potion of Water Breathing Extended
|
|Lingering Potion of Water Breathing
|Lingering Potion of Water Breathing Extended
|name = Lingering Potion of Water Breathing
|ingredients = [[Dragon's Breath]] +<br> '''Splash Potion of Water Breathing'''
|foot=1
}}

=== Mob loot ===
A [[witch]] has an 8.5% chance to drop a potion of Water Breathing if it dies while drinking the potion.

=== Generated loot ===
{{LootChestItem|potion-of-water-breathing}}

{{IN|be}}, the cauldron in a [[swamp hut]] has a 10% chance to contain a potion of Water Breathing.
